name: Minecraft Splash
description: Adds the splash text from Minecraft

new-appearance.name: Enable new appearance
new-appearance.description: Enables new appearance which is more familiar to Minecraft original.

animation-length.name: Animation length
animation-length.description: Changes length <cg>(in seconds)</c> of splash's animation.

easing-in.name: Scale-Up Easing
easing-in.description:
Changes scale-up easing of splash's animation.
Easings:
<cy>0:</c> None, <cy>1:</c> Ease In Out, <cy>2:</c> Ease In, <cy>3:</c> Ease Out, <cy>4:</c> Elastic In Out, <cy>5:</c> Elastic In, <cy>6:</c> Elastic Out, <cy>7:</c> Bounce In Out, <cy>8:</c> Bounce In, <cy>9:</c> Bounce Out, <cy>10:</c> Exponential In Out, <cy>11:</c> Exponential In, <cy>12:</c> Exponential Out, <cy>13:</c> Sine In Out, <cy>14:</c> Sine In, <cy>15:</c> Sine Out, <cy>16:</c> Back In Out, <cy>17:</c> Back In, <cy>18:</c> Back Out.

easing-out.name: Scale-Down Easing
easing-out.description:
Changes scale-down easing of splash's animation.
Easings:
<cy>0:</c> None, <cy>1:</c> Ease In Out, <cy>2:</c> Ease In, <cy>3:</c> Ease Out, <cy>4:</c> Elastic In Out, <cy>5:</c> Elastic In, <cy>6:</c> Elastic Out, <cy>7:</c> Bounce In Out, <cy>8:</c> Bounce In, <cy>9:</c> Bounce Out, <cy>10:</c> Exponential In Out, <cy>11:</c> Exponential In, <cy>12:</c> Exponential Out, <cy>13:</c> Sine In Out, <cy>14:</c> Sine In, <cy>15:</c> Sine Out, <cy>16:</c> Back In Out, <cy>17:</c> Back In, <cy>18:</c> Back Out.
